author: covener

author: covener
msg: rename the mod_headers variables used to track onsuccess vs. always for clarity

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-970. java: Under heavy load, THttpClient may fail with 'too many open files'

This patch updates our THttpClient to have two different modes of operation: its current functionality and a new mode that uses Apache's HttpClient library to provide higher throughput and better pooling functionality.

author: not
